Parents' Preferences.subtitle: The following visualizations provide insights into parental perspectives on school food programs, including their engagement, preferences for participation and program types, as well as funding preferences and affordability considerations.

charts.name: Parental Engagement
charts.blurb: This visualization shows key aspects of parental engagement in School Food Programs (SFPs).

charts.name: Program Preferences
charts.blurb: This chart illustrates parental preferences for School Food Program participation and types.

charts.name: Funding and Affordability
charts.blurb: This visualization presents parents' preferences regarding funding models and affordability for School Food Programs.
